README.md:
#CNN_sentence_chainer
---
### Implementation of "Convolutional Neural Network for Sentence Classification"(http://arxiv.org/abs/1408.5882) [Kim, 2014] 
---


## Require

```
numpy
chainer == 1.4.0
```

#### Install chainer

```
pip install chainer==1.4.0
```


## Usage:

If you run the code on GPU machine, add ```--gpu 0``` at the last.

#### initialize word vectors randomly
```
python main.py -W2V rand --non-static
```

#### initialize word vectors by pre-trained word2vec model

- Download trained word vectors(GoogleNews-vectors-negative300.bin) from```https://code.google.com/p/word2vec/```

- run

```
python main.py -W2V path/to/GoogleNews-vectors-negative300.bin --static --non-static
```
